extendedInfo.description: Addictive RPG with GANG WARS, TURF WARS, BOSSES, MERCENARIES, HIT-LIST, CITIES, MISSIONS, FIGHTS, TOURNAMENTS and lots more. Join now and become biggest gangsta in town.- DOWNTOWN MAFIA - LIVE TO FIGHT, FIGHT TO WIN - * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *Our Players say:âââââ "Love is one awesome mafia game with the best bits of all."âââââ  "Normally I hate this style of game, but this one is an absolute must have if you like Mafia games."âââââ "AWESOME This game has low memory usage and is great graphics are amazing no lag and has top of the line features"A legend returns back to reclaims his old hood... and this time he is gonna take it all. You have Jane (your old flame), Marco (the weapons guy), Luke (he knows his business) and BIG JIM to help you take over Downtown Mafia.  DTM offers players a unified gaming experience, whether you are on Android devices, iOS, Facebook, Chrome-Store or on your browser, this allows you to run your same pocket mafia empire from anywhere."The life of a wanted criminal is not easy, but it is very entertaining."â Be what you wanna be, HUSTLER, RUNNER or FIGHTER and build your mafia world.â Master missions/jobs in various cities around the world.â Become a big time gangsta, fight other mafia bosses across other devices and platforms in real-time.â Win the mafia wars and loot them dry.â Gain experience in the crime city and progress through unlimited levels.â Rule the streetz, build your own crime story.â Earn unique reputation (achievements) for reaching specific goals.â Unlock new exciting missions, powerful weapons and money minting businesses/properties.â Build a strong mobile mafia empire faster by recruiting from Facebook or expand your crime family with mob-code.â Prepare for the mafia shootout, buy the best weapons, armors, vehicles and arm all your mobsters to grow stronger.â Set a tag-line for your mafia kingdom for the whole world to see.â Become a tycoon by managing your business empire. â Loot powerful rare items in special missions.â Start the mob wars, add bounty on rival mobsters to add them to the Hitlist.â GANG WARS / Clans/ Family. There is nothing better than running the show just the way you like it. â DEATHMATCHS for totally different type of WAR experience.â TOURNAMENTS for mega rewards.FEATURES:â Sync your account with Facebook.â Fight mob bosses from other devices and popular platforms.â No need of your mobile EMI number for playing or transferring accounts.â Recruit your real friends using our advanced Facebook integration.â Supports all mobile and tablet resolutions.â Top-notch graphics, engaging sound-scape, intelligent user interface and smooth performance.â Real-time in-game notifications about mob request, attacks etc â Live @World feeds.â Custom Avatars with Gravatarâ In-game player profile & live comments.â Rival List keep tab on your enemies.â NPC BOSS Fights.â Live leader boards (Mob-level and Global) to see were you stand against the rest of the players.â It's a good game, DOWNLOAD NOW :)- DOWNTOWN MAFIA - PLAY ONLINE  - * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * If you have connected your mafia to Facebook, you can now play it online too... just open your favorite browser and goto,http://play.dtmafia.mobiâ Built with the power of HTML5.â Supports desktop (chrome or safari), mobile or tablet browsers.â Optimized for web performance.â Connects to the same mafia account on your device if you have already enabled unified gamingâ Packs the same excellent graphics and UI of Androd version.- DOWNTOWN MAFIA - ON FACEBOOK  - * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * For the latest tips & tricks, like our Facebook page,http://www.facebook.com/DTMafiaDeveloper: DynamicNext Mobile - BEST ANDROID GAMESContact Us: android@dtmafia.mobiVisit Our Website: http://www.dynamicnext.comFollow Us On Twitter: http://twitter.com/DynamicNext
